name: Hiking
description: I enjoy exploring the beautiful mountains around Isfahan and other parts of Iran. Hiking helps me clear my mind and connect with nature.
achievements: Climbed Mount Damavand (5,610m), Iran's highest peak
Completed the Alam-Kuh trail in the Alborz mountain range
Explored numerous hiking trails in the Zagros mountains

name: Photography
description: I have a passion for capturing the beauty of materials at both macro and micro scales. I especially enjoy metallographic photography and landscape photography.
achievements: Won 2nd place in the university's scientific photography contest
Published several microstructure images in research papers
Created a personal portfolio of landscape photographs from across Iran

name: Playing Santoor
description: The santoor is a traditional Persian hammered dulcimer that I've been playing for several years. It helps me relax and connect with my cultural heritage.
achievements: Performed at the university's cultural festival
Teaching basics to two fellow students

name: Reading Technical Books
description: I enjoy expanding my knowledge by reading books on materials science, engineering, and related fields. This helps me stay updated with the latest developments in my field.
achievements: Read over 50 technical books in the past three years
Maintain a personal digital library of reference materials
Participate in a monthly book club with fellow engineering students

name: Cooking Traditional Persian Food
description: Cooking is both a science and an art for me. I enjoy preparing traditional Persian dishes and experimenting with different ingredients and techniques.
achievements: Mastered several complex Persian rice dishes (Tahchin, Zereshk Polo)
Organized cooking gatherings for international students to experience Persian cuisine
Developed my own variations of traditional recipes
